description: At this station, the assembly technician assembles the spindle and installs it on the vehicle.
title: Spindle Install

instructions: Install three (3) M12x1.25 mm torx head bolts in the Z06 inner hub with Loctite® Threadlocker 271™.
Using a T55 socket, torque the bolts to 75 ft/lbs.
step-1.title: Install the inner hub on the spindle

instructions: Clean the ID of the spindle and the OD of the ball joints with brake cleaner and degreaser.
Wipe clean with a lint free shop towel.
Install the washers and castle nuts on the ball joints.
Torque the castle nuts to 30 ft/lbs and turn it an additional 140°.
Ensure the castle nut notch lines up with the hole in the ball joints and install a cotter pin.
step-2.title: Install the spindle on the ball joints
